extendedInfo.description: The best and easy to use Drudge Report reader on the Android Market and the only one with a widget, search, and tablet support.Easily read articles and see images/watch videos from the Drudge Report (drudgereport.com) specifically formatted for your mobile device.Articles are parsed and formatted in a "Readability" like manner.Share the articles with friends by sms, email, twitter, facebook, etc.Note: If you receive an error loading a link, you may be able to use the view original button in the Action bar to load the article. The formatter still has a few issues with certain web sites.This app is not affiliated with or authorized by the Drudge Report.Email suggestions to support@brennasoft.com

reviews.title: My choice of Drudge apps but...
reviews.comment: I\'d like the choice of using my installed browser by default for viewing the original article. The app\'s built-in browser in too slow. I\'d also like it to leave off the \"Via...\" text from my tweets. I ALWAYS remove it manually anyway. It is wasteful, considering Twitter is limited to 140 characters to begin with. Do these things and I\'ll give it the 5 stars it will then deserve.
reviews.author: Tony Freeman

reviews.title: Update sucks and Pro version sucks more!
reviews.comment: Updated the free app and started crashing immediately. Upgraded to pro version to fix that. Started crashing even more!
reviews.author: Bill Alsobrook

reviews.title: Wierd Issue
reviews.comment: Call me crazy but the articles get all goobered up and mix themselves up. This happens a lot in this app, never experienced it before using other ones. Best layout though. Very well designed!
reviews.author: Adam Bradshaw

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: This app is below average... Not extraordinarily stable... It often will not open, especially from the widget... I can\'t remember if I paid for this 1 or not, but if I did I made a mistake.  Samsung Tab 2 7\"  Yes I do have the pro version
reviews.author: Jeff Keeler

reviews.title: Great for story browsing.
reviews.comment: The set up is awesome and very easy to read. I\'ve tried all the Drudge apps and this is by far the best. It\'s not perfect by any means, but it gets the job done. One thing that sucks is the inability to view any type of video on the app. Please fix this!
reviews.author: Josh Chastain

reviews.title: Wasted money
reviews.comment: Free version is better. Unhappy with purchase
reviews.author: Dan Neuenswander

reviews.title: Hate HATE the update. Expect better for paid app.
reviews.comment: What the hell happened to the share functions? I cant even use this anymore, have to go to actual website.   Update sucks big time. Waste of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How stupid is that!
reviews.comment: You can put the free version on the sd card but not the pro version!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Builtin browser sucks
reviews.comment: Please add the option to view full article in browser of choice.  The built in browser sucks and cant display videos which are common drudge links.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best Drudge viewer, but still needs improvement
reviews.comment: Would love to be able to swipe through the different sections, instead of having to click/select. Also, would be very cool to swipe the list of articles from the left while viewing an article. (similar to the Evernote, YouTube, Falcon for Twitter, etc.)
reviews.author: Lake Wagner

reviews.title: 9/16/12 Update
reviews.comment: Still 5 stars but the last update sucks. Very plastic, not very responsive feel to the app, photos have disapeared.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t like the removal of tabs
reviews.comment: Really would like to see that tabbed format return or at least have the option like it used to have...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seriously?
reviews.comment: It took me ten minutes to get this POS to work at all. No refund button after install. Total ripoff and no way to configure the screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: The only thing I\'d like to see added to this app is the ability to swipe left and right to change columns.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Works very well. I love the layout too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Works as advertized.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Older version was visually more appealing than current version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Top notch !
reviews.comment: The best of the drudge readers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New UI Sucks
reviews.comment: The old UI was much better, please bring it back! Also, the widget is gone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice, no ads.
reviews.author: A Google User
